name: MM Grupp
overview: MM Grupp is a privately owned holding and investment company headquartered in Estonia. The group has made strategic investments in different sectors, including pharmaceuticalsâ€™ distribution (Magnum) and real estate development (Ecobay). Furthermore, the group strongly focuses on new venture capital investments to bring innovative products and services to the market (Bacterfield, Villa Benita). Group companies employ more than 1,000 employees and mainly operate in Europe.
